content:
A powerful, lightweight theme for Hugo built with Tailwind CSS. This is a demo site built entirely using Congo. It also contains a complete set of theme documentation. Congo is flexible and is great for both static page-based content (like this demo) or a traditional blog with a feed of recent posts.
This is a demo of the page layout. Switch layout ↻ Explore the sample pages to get a feel for what Congo can do. If you like what you see, check out the project on Github or read the Installation guide to get started.
